name: One Button Game (FireTotemGames)
description:
One Button Game

A game made for the Selected Topics in Game Engineering lecture at the Alpen-Adria-University in Klagenfurt.

Flappy Bird meets Portal.

Use the mouse or space bar to control the rotation of the player character and navigate it through an endless obstacle parcour.

Use the portal function of the walls to your advantage and dodge tricky obstacles.

Move straight to gather speed and increase your score multiplier.

How far can you push your high score?

Team

Sebastian Uitz (https://firetotemgames.com/)

  • Game Design
  • Programming
  • Sound Effects

Graphics from "Scrible Platformer" by Asset Jesus (Kenney) https://kenney.nl/assets/scribble-platformer

Font "Fredoka One" by Milena Brandao under the Open Font License https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fredoka+One?category=Display,Monospace#standard-styles

Music "Scape from the City" by Rolemusic is licensed under CC BY 3.0 https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/gigs_n_contest/rolemusic_-_gigs_n_contest_-_04_Scape_from_the_city
